LanguageData.PawnEditor.OverrideVanilla.Desc: Override the vanilla character creation screen with the pawn editor screen. If false, there will be a Pawn Editor button on the bottom the screen to open the editor.
LanguageData.PawnEditor.InGameDevButton.Desc: Enable the button in dev mode to open the pawn editor window.
LanguageData.PawnEditor.UseSilver.Desc: Point limit will be amount of silver in the current colony, and usage of points will deduct silver.
LanguageData.PawnEditor.CountNPCs.Desc: If enabled, then NPC pawns will also impact your point limit.
LanguageData.PawnEditor.ShowEditButton.Desc: Show a button in the bar of buttons on the bottom to open the pawn editor to a selected pawn.
LanguageData.PawnEditor.EnforceHARRestrictions.Desc: When true, HAR's restrictions for things like apparel and thoughts will be enforced in the editor.
LanguageData.PawnEditor.HideRandomFactions.Desc: Whether to hide non-colony factions while editing pawns before starting.
